verses.verse: {Judgment Comes to Judah's Leaders} d "Note this! The Lord G od of the Heavenly Armies is taking away from Jerusalem and Judah everything that your society needs {Lit. Judah both supply and support} all food supplies and all water supplies,
the mighty man and the warrior, the judge and the prophet, the fortune-teller and the elder,
the commander of fifty and the man of rank, and the counselor, the expert magician, and the medium.
"I will make youths their princes, and infants will rule over them.
People will oppress one another It will be man against man and neighbor against neighbor. The young will be disrespectful to the old, and the worthless to the honorable.
"For a man will grab his brother in his own father's house, and say, «You have a cloak, so you be our leader, and this heap of ruins will be under your rule!'

"But {So 1QIsa a LXX; the Heb. lacks But} at that time, {Lit. day} he'll protest! {Lit. he'll cry out} He'll say, «I won't be your healer. I have neither food nor clothing in my house! You're not going to make me a leader of the people!'
"For Jerusalem has stumbled, and Judah has fallen, because what they say and do opposes {So 1QIsa a ; MT LXX read do is towards} the Lord; they keep defying him. {Lit. defying his glorious presence}

"The expressions on their faces give them away. {Lit. faces bears witness against them} They parade their sin around like Sodom; they don't even try to {1QIsa a MT lack try to} hide it. How horrible it will be for them, because they have brought disaster on themselves!"
{Encouragement to the Righteous} d "Tell {So 1QIsa a ; the Heb. lacks Tell} the righteous that things will go well, because they will enjoy {Lit. eat} the fruit of their actions."

{Warning to the Wicked} d "How terrible it will be for the wicked! Disaster is headed their way, because what they did with their hand {So 1QIsa a ; MT LXX read hands} will be repaid {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads done} to them.

"As for my people, children {Or youths} are their oppressors, and women rule over them. My people, your leaders are misleading you they're giving you confusing directions." {So MT; 1QIsa a reads they're devouring your paths}
{When God Goes to Court} d The Lord is taking his place to argue his case; he's standing up to judge the people.

The Lord will go to court {Lit. go into judgment} to oppose {Lit. with} the elders and princes of his people: "You're the ones who have been devouring the vineyard, the plunder of the poor is in your own houses!
How dare you crush {Lit. What do you mean by crushing} my people as you grind down the face of the poor?" declares the Lord God of the Heavenly Armies. {So 1QIsa a MT; LXX lacks this line}

{Judgment of Jerusalem's Women} d The Lord also says: "Because Zion's women are so haughty, and walk with outstretched necks, flirting with their eyes, prancing {Or mincing} along as they walk, and making tinkling noises with their ankle bracelets, {Lit. their feet}

therefore the Lord {So 1QIsa a corrector; 1QIsa a 4QIsa b MT read my Lord ; LXX reads God} will afflict sores on the heads of Zion's women, and the Lord {So 1QIsa a corrector MT; 1QIsa a reads my Lord} will expose their private parts.
"At that time, {Lit. In that day} the Lord {So 1QIsa a LXX; MT 1QIsa a corrector read my Lord} will take away the finery of the ankle bracelets, headbands, crescents,
pendants, bracelets, veils,
headdresses, armlets, sashes, perfume boxes, charms,
signet rings, nose rings,
fine robes, capes, {So 1QIsa a ; 4QIsa b MT read capes and cloaks} purses,
mirrors, linen garments, tiaras, and veils.

"And it will come about that instead of fragrance there will be {The 1QIsa a lacks will be a stench} a stench; instead of a belt, a rope; instead of well-set hair, baldness; instead of a fine robe, sackcloth; and instead of beauty, shame. {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads burning instead of beauty ; LXX lacks this line}
Your men will die violently, {Lit. will fall by the sword} while your forces {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads force} fall {1QIsa a MT lack fall} in battle
and her gates lament and mourn. Ravaged, she will sit on the ground."
